thread.title: Robert Altman

author: Robert Altman
title: Robert Altman
text: Tried to find a roofer I had done business with several years ago. Found a phone number online, turned out it was HomeAdvisor, who told me that the roofer I was looking for wasn't available, but they offered me another highly-rated roofer. He worked out so well that when I had another job (this time for carpet repair) I immediately contacted HomeAdvisor. Another great experience (other than having to pay the pros for their work).
